page.title: 07S'gate/East Barnet Border
page.content: This is a pleasant residential area consisting mainly of owner-occupied semi_detached houses. An average house now costs between Â£65,000 and Â£70,000. A small minority of the population is of Asian, Greek Cypriot and Turkish Cypriot origin. The focal point of the area is Hampden Square, a small shopping centre served by several bus routes. Oak Hill Park, an extensive area of open parkland with oak and willow trees, offers local recreational facilities which include: miniature golf; bowling; football pitches. Several local schools use the park for their sporting activities. Passing through the park and also part of the residential area is Pymmes Brook which supports a variety of flora. Pasture near Oakhill Theological College is used for grazing heifers during the summer.
